lead_paragraph: Australia's Olympic delegation head Kitty Chiller has questioned Russia's determination to eliminate drug cheats after it was announced that the country would host an alternative event for banned track and field athletes in Moscow.

headline.print_headline: Chiller Pours Cold Water on Russia Cheats Meet
headline.main: Chiller Pours Cold Water on Russia Cheats Meet

snippet: Australia's Olympic delegation head Kitty Chiller has questioned Russia's determination to eliminate drug cheats after it was announced that the country would host an alternative event for banned track and field athletes in Moscow....
